member.name: GET_FILEEX_INFO_LEVELS
member.summary: Defines values that are used with the and functions to specify the information level of the returned data.

member.name: GET_FILEEX_INFO_LEVELS.GetFileExInfoStandard
member.summary: The or function retrieves a standard set of attribute information. The data is returned in astructure.

member.name: GET_FILEEX_INFO_LEVELS.GetFileExMaxInfoLevel
member.summary: One greater than the maximum value. Valid values for this enumeration will be less than this value.
